text: Jose Luis Arribas Granados (born January 14, 1975 in Madrid) is a swimmer from Spain. He had a disability: he is blind and is an B2/S12 type swimmer. He raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He finished second in the breaststroke. == References == Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
